Display.description: Prints a String to the console

Group.description: add files to a connected group

Break.description: break out of a loop or if

True.description: the value of the bool is set to 1

False.description: the value of the bool is set to 0

+.description: can be used to add 2 compatible datatypes together

-.description: can be used to remove 2 compatible datatypes from one another

*.description: can be used to multiply 2 compatible datatypes together

/.description: can be used to divide 2 compatible datatypes from each other

=.description: can be used to set a datatype

++.description: can be used to add 1 to certain datatypes

--.description: can be used to remove 1 from certain datatypes

==.description: can be used to check if 2 of the same datatypes are the same

+=.description: can be used to add 2 compatible datatypes together

-=.description: can be used to remove 2 compatible datatypes from one another

:.description: declares when variables are added to a statement

(.description: used to define logic and data
